DOC.criteria: Diagnosis angioimmunoblastic Tcell lymphoma ( recurrent refractory ) base histologic examination . At least one objective measurable evaluable disease parameter . Have fail least one type treatment : chemotherapy , autotransplant , steroid treatment . Patients may receive concurrent chemotherapy . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 02 . Adequate renal function indicate creatinine < = 1.5 upper limit normal ( ULN ) . Adequate liver function indicate alkaline phosphatase , Aspartate Aminotransferase ( AST ) , Alanine Aminotransferase ( ALT ) < = 2x upper limit normal . Total bilirubin < = 2x upper limit normal . Age 18 old . Prior cyclosporine Tacrolimus ( FK506 ) . Prior allogeneic transplant . Evidence active infection . Congestive heart failure , kidney failure , liver failure , severe comorbidities . Evidence active neurological impairment . Previous history hypersensitivity cyclosporine and/or Cremorphor EL ( polyoxyethylated oil ) . History malignancy ( cure carcinoma situ cervix basal cell carcinoma skin ) . pregnant breastfeed woman . Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) positive .
